messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I'm calling about a friend who lives at 6155 Gray Street. I've been told her boyfriend is assaulting her.
Okay, what's her name?
Her name is Ashley.
And the boyfriend is beating her up?
Yes, that's what I was told. She called a friend in Broomfield, and they told me to check on her.
Alright. What's your name?
My name is B.
And what's your phone number?
I don't know off the top of my head.
Okay, so this information is third-party?
Yeah, but she has a son and she's in trouble.
Alright, it's in the basement of 6155 Gray Street, correct?
Yes, there's an outside entrance from the garage on the south side.
We'll send someone over there.
Thank you.
What is your current location?
I don't know.
I have a hostage. If you don't tell your people to back off, she's going to die.
Please stay calm. Let's talk this through.
Get them away from the house now, or the hostage is dead.
Sir, stay on the line with me, okay?
I'm watching them. They're not leaving.
We need to communicate to get this resolved. Please stay with me.
They're not leaving. I'm losing my temper.
I understand. Tell me your name so we can talk.
It doesn't matter what my name is. Keep them away from the house.
We are going to do everything we can to help you. Please, talk to me.
Get them away from this house now.
What is the hostage's name?
It doesn't matter now.
What kind of weapon do you have?
I'm hanging up if they don't leave. I promise you bad things will happen.
Please stay with me. We need to work this out.
Why are they still around the house? You're not getting this.
I'm trying my best. Tell me what you need.
Get them away from the house right now.
We are doing everything we can. Please stay on the line.
I'm about to start hurting the hostage.
Please, we need to resolve this peacefully. Don't hurt anyone.
I'm done talking.
Sir, do not hang up. We can work this out.
This is it. I'm done.
Please, talk to me. I just want to help.
Why are they still around the house? Do you want this little girl hurt?
I just got here. Let's work this through.
I'm done. I'm hanging up.
Please, don't hang up. We can find a solution.
